description: Founder with full access to all company information and strategic data

data_sources.hr_policies: Full access to all HR policies and procedures
data_sources.product_docs: Full access to all product documentation
data_sources.financial_reports: Access to all financial data and reports
data_sources.strategic_plans: Access to company strategy and roadmap
data_sources.legal_documents: Access to legal contracts and agreements
data_sources.analytics: Access to all business analytics and metrics

sample_queries: What is our current burn rate?
Show me the revenue projections for Q4
What are the details of the pending acquisition?
How many customers churned last month?
What is the total compensation for executives?
What are the key risks mentioned in the last board meeting?
